page.title: 16Social Concerns in Rhos
page.content: Accoring to our survey,people seem to hold very strong feelings for important buildings like the Miners Institute in Rhos.All the people who we asked remembered with fondness ,the 'stute'in its former glory. The next social concern of Rhos is the open cast mmining.It is situated at Maes Einion which is near Hall Street.The National Stripmining Company are applying for permission to mine.There is great suspicion about any any company's proposals to create a quarry.This is due to the previous workings at the "Delph"site.This company went broke and failed to redevelop.During a local meeting at the community center there was a unanimous vote agaist the proposal when discussed with councillors.People care about jobs but care about their environment more!
